author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Southern Railway Mazdoor Union (SRMU) conducted a secret ballot in Tiruchi Railway Division on Thursday to ascertain the opinion of the railway employees on the proposed indefinite strike in April.

The three-day exercise will go on till February 13. Over 4,500 employees of Tiruchi Division cast their lot on day one, an SRMU office bearer here said. The Tiruchi Division alone accounts for over 9,500 railway employees of which more than 7,500 are attached to the SRMU.

The indefinite strike has been planned in support of their charter of demands including scrapping of new pension scheme and filling up of vacant posts in railways besides to express protest against the VII Pay Commission recommendations which the union said went against the interests of the work force. The strike has been proposed from April 11 onwards.
title: Secret ballot by SRMU
